src:
ＮＹダウ終値、小幅値下がり０・０７ドル安

06 Nov 2019, 22:12

　【ニューヨーク＝小林泰明】６日のニューヨーク株式市場で、ダウ平均株価（３０種）は小幅に値下がりし、終値は前日比０・０７ドル安の２万７４９２・５６ドルだった。ダウ平均は前日５日まで２日連続で過去最高値を更新していた。
　情報技術（ＩＴ）企業の銘柄が多いナスダック店頭市場の総合指数の終値は、２４・０５ポイント安の８４１０・６３だった。
text:
NY Dow closing price, small price drop 0.07 dollar depreciation

06 Nov 2019, 22:12

[New York = Yasuaki Kobayashi] In the New York stock market on the 6th, the Dow average stock price (30 types) fell slightly, and the closing price was 27,492,56 dollars, a decrease of 0.07 dollars compared to the previous day. The Dow average had a record high for two consecutive days until the previous day.
The closing price of the overall index of the Nasdaq over-the-counter market with many information technology (IT) companies was 8410.63, a decrease of 24.05 points.
